data.title: M. G. Ramachandran
data.meta_description: M. G. Ramachandran - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. M. G. Ramachandran (MGR) was an Indian actor, director, producer, and politician who served as Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu for three terms until his death in 1987. He began his career as a stage actor and made his film debut in 1936, eventually becoming one of the most popular Tamil film stars. MGR joined the Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam party in 1953 and rose to prominence in the party while continuing his successful film career. In 1972, he split from the party to form his own party, the All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam. He was elected Chief Minister in 1977, becoming the first film actor to hold the position of
